languages.text: "Удивительно непредсказуемый исход, не так ли?" {n}Абеляр заботливо хлопает вас по спине, пока вы боретесь с очередным рвотным позывом.{/n}
"An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Удивительно непредсказуемый исход, не так ли?" {n}Абеляр заботливо хлопает вас по спине, пока вы боретесь с очередным рвотным позывом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "An outcome that was singularly hard to anticipate, was it not?" {n}Abelard slaps your back caringly as you fight off another urge to vomit.{/n}
"An outcome that was singularly hard to anticipate, was it not?" {n}Abelard slaps your back caringly as you fight off another urge to vomit.{/n}
"An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}
"An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}
"An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}
"An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

languages.text: «Un resultado totalmente inesperado, ¿no le parece?». {n}Abelard te da unas palmaditas amables en la espalda mientras luchas por contener otra oleada de náuseas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un resultado totalmente inesperado, ¿no le parece?». {n}Abelard te da unas palmaditas amables en la espalda mientras luchas por contener otra oleada de náuseas.{/n}

languages.text: 「まったく予期せぬ結果だったのでは？」{n}あなたが吐き気を堪える中で、アベラルドがあなたの背中を優しくなでる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まったく予期せぬ結果だったのでは？」{n}あなたが吐き気を堪える中で、アベラルドがあなたの背中を優しくなでる。{/n}

languages.text: “这样的结果实在是让人始料未及，是吧？”{n}阿贝拉德关切地拍着你的背，帮助你抵挡另一波呕吐的冲动。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这样的结果实在是让人始料未及，是吧？”{n}阿贝拉德关切地拍着你的背，帮助你抵挡另一波呕吐的冲动。{/n}

languages.text: "Ein überaus unerwartetes Ergebnis, nicht wahr?" {n}Abelard klopft dir behutsam auf den Rücken, während du eine weitere Welle der Übelkeit niederringst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein überaus unerwartetes Ergebnis, nicht wahr?" {n}Abelard klopft dir behutsam auf den Rücken, während du eine weitere Welle der Übelkeit niederringst.{/n}

languages.text: « Qui aurait pu prévoir une telle issue ? » {n}Abélard vous tape dans le dos avec bienveillance alors que la nausée vous reprend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qui aurait pu prévoir une telle issue ? » {n}Abélard vous tape dans le dos avec bienveillance alors que la nausée vous reprend.{/n}

languages.text: "Hiç de beklenmeyen bir sonuç oldu, değil mi?" {n}Abelard, bir bulantı dalgasının daha üstesinden gelmeye çalıştığın esnada şefkatle sırtına vuruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An outcome most unanticipated, was it not?" {n}Abelard thumps your back caringly as you fight off another wave of nausea.{/n}
